name: The Lonely Child
description:
Description/Story

You play as O, an orphan who has woken up to find his orphanage empty and abandoned, and his friends completely missing, with only freakish ghouls in their place. You must explore the abandoned orphanage, learning the subtleties of ghost hunting whilst collecting items, talking to ghosts during turn-based combat, unlocking doors, and maybe, just maybe, finding the way out of your former home.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

WASD - Move

Mouse - Control The Camera

Tab - Open Inventory

E or LMB - Interact / Proceed Dialogue

F - Switch Shoulder View
